@ anyone with ISDone.dll problem

i encountered this error and found a way:
the way of fixing this problem is almost idiotically simple.
basically you CAN'T type the install path using keyboard - you HAVE TO click your way through folders to select desired location. i tried several times using keyboard switching lower-case and upper-case to match my folder names (even tho it shouldnt be case sensitive) and even after selecting folder by mouse/browse button and erasing one character just to type it in again the same way by keyboard i got this error. that led me to only one conclusion - no keyboard typing, mouse clicks only lol...and poof, no ISDone.dll error!

this is a real deal so no worries, the game works and here is some proof (i made those screens myself):

http://img6.imageshack.us/img6/6771/relic00001d.jpg

http://img845.imageshack.us/img845/9443/relic00000.jpg

it seems one cant change account name from ALI213, but it is a small price to pay to play hehe

i hope this helps someone, if so dont be shy, post a feedback.
thank you extremezone! you're da man!

@barbaneli
i didnt say all this to point out manually created folder. the important thing is to choose the install path using browse button NOT by typing it with keyboard so the DoWar2R intall folder has to stay but you can customize disk/partition on which the installer will create it.
just click browse, select the folder you keep your games in and installer will add DoWar2R folder in which the game will be installed. i srsly dunno how to say it in better way.
i myself installed (NOT moved/copied after installation) to g:\games2\DoWar2R\ using this 'method' so it must be possible. it *may* be somehow system dependent, i am on win xp pro sp2 x86.

@barbaneli
the important thing is to choose the install path using browse button NOT by typing it with keyboard so the DoWar2R intall folder has to stay but you can customize disk/partition on which the installer will create it. just click browse, select the folder you keep your games in and installer will add DoWar2R folder in which the game will be installed. i srsly dunno how to say it in better way.

i myself installed (NOT moved/copied after installation) to g:\games2\DoWar2R\ using this 'method' so it must be possible. it *may* be somehow system dependent, i am on win xp pro sp2 x86. here is a screenshot from totalcommander to show you that it is possible http://img30.imageshack.us/img30/4728/dow2rcustompath.jpg. i have no intention of misleading anyone, i just wanna say that you can browse to choose other than default path. that is my suggestion for a solution, if you dont believe - fine by me. its for those who, like me, have small system partition and just cant squeeze in extra 4,5 GB.

is this only a expantion or the full game?? plz respond

you could call it an expansion since technically you cant play skirmish in this torrent. but the campaign is much more "full" or expanded upon than the last 2 damn of war campaign's. you can play as any of the six races now implemented. space marines, imperial guard, chaos marines, eldar, tiranid's, and ork's. and the amount of missions is quite expansive. will certainly eat alot of hours out of your day. on a side note the game itself has a skirmish mode but the torrent is bugged and wont allow it for some reason. so if you were gonna buy the game and decided not to with no skirmish and all than no worry's. as far as i can tell all the campaign missions work in this torrent tho. have fun gamein.

For all the people getting "Game is not being run as a known Dawn of War 2 product...Steam..." when starting the game.
